channel.title: Database on htr3n's

Hibernate: Migrating 3.x to 5.xhttps://blog.test:8443/2018/06/migrating-hibernate/Tue, 12 Jun 2018 00:00:00 +0000https://blog.test:8443/2018/06/migrating-hibernate/Recently I had to upgrade a codebase using Hibernate 3.x ORM on Spring 3 to Hibernate 5 (and Spring 5, respectively). Here I note down some aspects and issues that I have to deal with during this migration.
